"Crawford": "Moving right along, I'd like you to learn more about this place."
"Especially you, who has just arrived on Halpha. I'm sure there's still much you'd like to know."
"The Operators here will serve as your support for this. For the finer details, please consult them."
"Right. First, will you go speak with Liu Lin?"
"You have my thanks for joining us in this fight."
"Even larger battles await your future, but I'm hoping for the best. It's good to have you."
"If anything at all is troubling you, I'd like you to feel comfortable enough to let me know."
"The Operators will also surely be able to give you counsel."
"Thank you for volunteering for such a dangerous mission."
"As I've said earlier, Nex Aelio is fearsomely strong. Take the utmost caution."
"I've sent you coordinates to the nearest \"Cocoon\", a highly optimized training facility. An instructor will be waiting for you there with the details."
"Please head over there after making your preparations. Good luck."
